FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Professional skincare for your daily routine. We combine quality, innovation, and care for your skin.

HOME.HERO_TITLE:
Take Care of Your Skin
with Novita
HOME.HERO_SUBTITLE: Professional skincare solutions for every stage of your daily routine. Cleansing, toning, and protection.
HOME.WHY_CHOOSE_LI1_TEXT: Our products are designed to protect your skin from environmental factors and provide deep cleansing.
HOME.WHY_CHOOSE_LI2_TEXT: Special intimate hygiene line with prebiotics to support your natural balance.
HOME.WHY_CHOOSE_LI3_TEXT: 100% natural cotton for our pads and buds, ensuring the softest touch.
HOME.WHY_CHOOSE_LI4_TEXT: We offer solutions for every stage: makeup removal, cleansing, and toning.
HOME.INSTA_SUBTITLE: Join our community to stay updated on the latest news and beauty tips.

ABOUT.HERO_SUBTITLE: We create products that care for your natural beauty in today's world.
ABOUT.PILLAR1_TEXT: A unique series of products developed for city dwellers. Deeply cleanses pores and creates an invisible barrier against toxins and smog.
ABOUT.PILLAR2_TEXT: We use only 100% natural high-quality cotton. Our pads and buds provide the gentlest touch without causing irritation.
ABOUT.PILLAR3_TEXT: An innovative line of intimate hygiene that supports the skin's natural microbiome, providing a long-lasting feeling of freshness and comfort.
ABOUT.BRAND_P1: Novita is a premium brand of the Biosphere Corporation, embodying the idea of professional care at home.
ABOUT.BRAND_P2: We understand the challenges your skin faces every day. That's why we invest in scientific research and choose only safe, eco-friendly materials.
ABOUT.BRAND_P3: Our goal is to make daily beauty rituals as effective and pleasant as possible for every woman.

CONTACTS.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACTS.SUBTITLE: Our Contacts
CONTACTS.DESCRIPTION: We are always open to communication, suggestions, and questions about product quality.
CONTACTS.SAFETY_NOTE: We care about your safety and the quality of every product. Your feedback helps us get better.
